text:
You might have been thinking it’s quiet in <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> lately, are things slowing down?

Well I’m excited to share why you haven’t heard much lately. Some of us have been devoting a lot of time towards another project, and just haven’t been able to devote enough to CrankShaft. The project is not slowing down, just many of the contributors have been working on throwing an awesome Developer focused event - taking place during Inbound week.

Are you a developer? You’re invited.

Want to stay connected to this event - join: <#CCGU4R4ER|extend>
After that head on over to
<https://devday.splashthat.com>
for more information. We are so excited to see you there, and if you can’t make it, we plan to live stream.
